Class TextLine

  • Object
    • PDFjet.NET.TextLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable
    public class TextLine
extends Object
implements IDrawable
    Used to create text line objects.

      • DrawOn

        public float[] DrawOn​(Page page)
               throws Exception
        Draws this text line on the specified page.
        Specified by:
        DrawOn in interface IDrawable
        Parameters:
        page - the page to draw this text line on.
        Returns:
        float[] with the coordinates of the bottom right corner.
        Throws:
        Exception - If an input or output exception occurred
